__TOC__

* Regular <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/meetings/ubuntu-ie/351/detail/|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at 9pm Irish time on Wednesday the 21^st^ of March, 2012. The meeting logs can be found <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2012-03-21|here]]</nowiki>.

* Some LoCo members joined the Ubuntu Global Jam at a face to face meetup in Limerick and others joined in on IRC and, for the first time, in a Google Hangout.  Details of the face to face meeting can be found <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ie/1578/detail/|here]]</nowiki>.

* Activity was logged on both the <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-ie/2012-March/thread.html| mailing list]]</nowiki> and our <nowiki>[[http://irclogs.ubuntu.com/2012/03/| IRC channel]]</nowiki>.
